fileDescription: Strings for the Steamworks wrapper extension plugin.

steamworks_ext.name: Steamworks (WebView2)
steamworks_ext.description: Access Steam features in the WebView2 export option.

app-id.name: App ID
app-id.desc: The Steam App ID to use. Leave empty to allow Steam to determine it.

development-mode.name: Development mode
development-mode.desc: Check to enable development mode, which sets the app ID and disables automatic restarting. Turn off for release.

enable-overlay.name: Enable overlay
enable-overlay.desc: Enable the Steam Overlay (using workaround). Disabling causes Steam to revert to fallbacks.

is-available.description: True if successfully initialized the Steam API.

is-running-on-steam-deck.description: Checks if Steam is running on a Steam Deck device.

on-overlay-shown.description: Triggered when the game overlay is shown.

on-overlay-hidden.description: Triggered when the game overlay is hidden.

on-any-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after any successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-achievement-unlock-success.description: Triggered after a successful 'Unlock achievement' action.

on-any-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after any 'Unlock achievement' action fails.

on-achievement-unlock-error.description: Triggered after an 'Unlock achievement' action failed.

show-overlay-url.description: Show the Steam game overlay and load a URL from the web.

url.name: URL
url.desc: The URL to load in the overlay.

modal.name: Modal
modal.desc: Whether to display the URL in a modal style in the overlay.

unlock-achievement.description: Unlock an achievement for the current Steam game.

clear-achievement.description: Reset the unlock status of an achievement. Typically only used for testing purposes.

account-id.description: The current user's Steam account ID.

static-account-key.description: The current user's Steam static account key as a string.

persona-name.description: The current user's Steam persona (display) name.

player-steam-level.description: Gets the Steam level of the user, as shown on their Steam community profile.

app-id.description: Gets the App ID of the current game.

steam-ui-language.description: Returns the language the Steam client is running in.

current-game-language.description: Gets the current language that the user has set.

available-game-languages.description: Gets a comma separated list of the languages the current app supports.

achievement.description: In an achievement trigger, the 'API Name' of the achievement.
